result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Edward Joel Vargas-Aponte

records.addlTxt: COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for calendar call.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.

Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court.  Elaine B. Fehrs on behalf of Gerald Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for calendar call. Court is in trial on another case and is unable to proceed on this matter. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Calendar call scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for pretrial conference. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.  Calendar call scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
2/28/22.  sb

Court ordered $150 cash bail posted on 02/28/2022 to be returned to whomever posted it.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with ALR (DOB 6-18-1998
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Edward Joel Vargas-Aponte in court with attorney Ashley Fard.  Defendant Edward Joel Vargas-Aponte in custody.  Matthew Richard Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Edward Joel Vargas-Aponte appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d9e3cc7f-7791-ec2d-80d3-5bfcdc106eb3  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
